attributes.action: Change the law so that you have to opt out of organ donation rather than opt in.
attributes.background: There are over 4000 people in the UK currently waiting for organs that need transplants. So by changing the laws, more organs will be readily available to those who need them.

rejection.details:
From Spring 2020, England will adopt an "opt-out" organ donation system, so we're not sure what further action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You can find out more about this change by clicking on the link below.

 https://www.organdonation.nhs.uk/uk-laws/organ-donation-law-in-england/
